verses.text: \w After|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* blood \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* guilty \w was|strong="H3068"\w* shed, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

Number \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* kindreds, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* able \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, being \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w were|strong="H3383"\w*

\w From|strong="H3318"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* number \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*:

Ruben \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w His|strong="H3478"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* Henoch, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Henochites: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Phallu, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Phalluites:

\w And|strong="H2696"\w* Hesron, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Hesronites: \w and|strong="H2696"\w* Charmi, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Charmites.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* stock \w of|strong="H4940"\w* Ruben: whose \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* found \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* forty-three \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*.
\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phallu \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w were|strong="H0834"\w* Namuel \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiron. \w These|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiron \w the|strong="H0834"\w* princes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* rose \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sedition \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H5327"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w opening|strong="H6310"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* Core, many others dying, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* burned \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* great miracle wrought,
\w That|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* Core perished, \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* perish.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their kindreds: Namuel, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Namuelites: \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jaminites|strong="H3228"\w*: \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jachinites|strong="H3200"\w*:

Zare, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* him \w is|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H7586"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H7586"\w* Zarites: \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* him \w is|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H7586"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H7586"\w* Saulites.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H0428"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H0428"\w* stock \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8099"\w*, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H0428"\w* whole number \w was|strong="H4940"\w* \w twenty-two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their kindreds: Sephon, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* hin; \w Is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Sephonites: Aggi, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Aggites: Suni, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Sunites:

Ozni, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* him is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Oznites: Her, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* him is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Herites:

\w Arod|strong="H0720"\w*, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* him is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w Arodites|strong="H0722"\w*: Ariel, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* him is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Arielites.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* whole \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0776"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, Her \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Onan|strong="H0209"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w both|strong="H4191"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Chanaan.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* kindreds \w were|strong="H1961"\w*: Sela, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Selaites: Phares, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Pharesites: Zare, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Zarites.

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phares \w were|strong="H1961"\w*: Hesron, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Hesronites: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hamul|strong="H2538"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Hamulites|strong="H2539"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* Juda, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* whole \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* seventy-six \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their kindreds: Thola, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tholaites: Phua, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Phuaites:

Jasub, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Jasubites: Semran, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Semranites.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* kindreds \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, whose \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w was|strong="H4940"\w* sixty-four \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zabulon \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their kindreds: Sared, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Saredites: \w Elon|strong="H0356"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Elonites|strong="H0440"\w*: Jalel, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Jalelites.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* kindreds \w of|strong="H4940"\w* Zabulon, whose \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w was|strong="H4940"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8346"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their kindred, Manasses \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Machirites|strong="H4354"\w*. \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* Galaad, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Galaadites.

Galaad \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: Jezer, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w whom|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Jezerites: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Helec, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w whom|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Helecites:

\w And|strong="H4940"\w* \w Asriel|strong="H0844"\w*, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w Asrielites|strong="H0845"\w*: \w and|strong="H4940"\w* Sechem, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Sechemites:

\w And|strong="H4940"\w* Semida, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* Semidaites: \w and|strong="H4940"\w* \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, \w of|strong="H4940"\w* whom is \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H4940"\w* \w Hepherites|strong="H2662"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Salphaad, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H0518"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* these: Maala, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Noa, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hegla, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Melcha, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Thersa.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* Manasses, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w* \w fifty-two|strong="H2572"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their kindreds \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w*: Suthala, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w whom|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Suthalaites: \w Becher|strong="H1071"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w whom|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Becherites|strong="H1076"\w*: Thehen, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w whom|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Thehenites.
